record.field: A game similar to tennis but played on a table. Aka table tennis.
Hit the ball once on your side and once on the opponent side to keep the ball alive. If you can't do it, the other side gets a point.
A game where you try to put the ball through the hoop. Aka hooping.
You have to dribble the ball to move around the court and can't engage in rough physical contact or else you'll be called for a foul.
A game where you try to get the most points on the board by hitting multipliers or trying to hit the bullseye.
Players take turns throwing darts at the board behind the line. Inner small sections are 3x multipliers. Outer small sections are 2x multipliers. Bulls eye is 50 points.
